price: Mu by’ukuri (Farawo) twamweretse ibitangaza byacu byose, ariko yarabihinyuye yanga no kwemera.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرَيۡنَٰهُ ءَايَٰتِنَا كُلَّهَا فَكَذَّبَ وَأَبَىٰ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: walaqad araynāhu āyātinā kullahā fakadhaba wa-abā
